General.Name: TMP Steel
General.Description: TMP Steel Corporation manufactures and sells steel building materials in Taiwan. It offers rebars for civil structure in house, building, and public construction; and spheroidized steel wires, which are used in building steel, screw nuts, and auto parts. The company was formerly known as TMP International Corporation and changed its name to TMP Steel Corporation in July 2016. The company is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1.Name: Ms. Chia-Ling  Li
1.Title: Head of Accounting & Corp. Governance and Mang. of Fin.
